column4: I'm doing it now, well, didn't, folks there are mostly idle :/
did you go to  system/administration/hardware drivers
No, I have xfce4 with xbmc, so only apt-get update and apt-get install nvidia-current
You gave up on me mate? :)
you are also using xubuntu yes?
no, it's ubuntu minimal with xfce4 installed on it, that is it
ah open a terminal and try   /usr/bin/jockey-gtk
did you also check in the #xubuntu channel about this?
This program needs a running X session. Please use jockey-text for a command line version of Jockey.
I've installed it, should I try to set vesa in xorg.conf and then run jockey?
